name: Don't Kill Your Friends
description:
• two players recommended
  • Don't Kill Your Friends
    • it is the name of this game
    • it is the general rule for this game
    • it is a good rule for life
  • local keyboard controls:
    • the player on the top-
      • left and right movement is controlled with A & D
      • jump is W
    • the player on the bottom-
      • left and right movement is controlled with the left and right arrows
      • jump is the up arrow
  • local controller controls:
    • you and your friend (who you are trying not to kill) each hold one half of the controller.
    • left stick and right stick move.
    • LB/L1 and RB/R1 jump.
  • online keyboard controls:
    • left and right movement is controlled with A & D
    • jump is [space]
  • online controller controls:
    • left stick to move
    • RB/R1 to jump
